channel.title: Foruth Research & Penetration Testing
channel.description: Security research blog of Pravin Mohite - Penetration Tester and Lab Developer specializing in vulnerability research, CTF-style lab creation, and offensive security techniques.

item.title: Windows Privilege Escalation via Weak Service Permissions
item.description: Learn how to exploit weak service permissions and permissive file system ACLs to escalate privileges on Windows systems. A comprehensive walkthrough for penetration testers.
item.author: pravi@foruth.github.io (Pravin Mohite)

item.title: Windows UAC Bypass via DLL Hijacking Walkthrough
item.description: Technical walkthrough of UAC bypass using DLL hijacking on Windows 10. Exploiting auto-elevating binaries to gain elevated privileges.
item.author: pravi@foruth.github.io (Pravin Mohite)

item.title: Windows Group Abuse - Part 3: Server Operators, Hyper-V Admins & Certificate Abuse
item.description:
Complete guide to Server Operators, Hyper-V Administrators, Remote Management, and Certificate Services group abuse for domain dominance.

Welcome to the final installment of our Windows Group Abuse series. We've covered data access groups and code execution groups. Now, let's explore the management interface groups.
item.author: pravi@foruth.github.io (Pravi)

item.title: Windows Group Abuse - Part 2: Print Operators, Hyper-V Administrators & Server Operators
item.description: Learn how Print Operators, Hyper-V Administrators and Server Operators can be abused to escalate to SYSTEM or Domain Admin. Includes attack chains, detection signals and mitigations.
item.author: pravi@foruth.github.io (Pravi)

item.title: Windows Group Abuse - Part 1: Backup Operators, Event Log Readers & DnsAdmins
item.description: Discover how Backup Operators, Event Log Readers and DnsAdmins can be abused to escalate to SYSTEM or Domain Admin. Practical attack chains, detection signals and immediate mitigations.
item.author: pravi@foruth.github.io (Pravi)
